items.longDescription:
FUTURALABORATORIES

FUTURALABORATORIES is a design company and lifestyle brand created by the artist FUTURA2000 in 1997, as a spinoff group to the parent company at that time; PROJECTDRAGON. FUTURALABORATORIES has always worked closely with UMBRELLA FILMS for visual amplification and TARANTULA DESIGNS as a graphic think tank. The brand has created many collections over multiple decades and found numerous partners in various collaborative efforts. FUTURALABORATORIES was rebooted in 2019 with excitement and engagement across multiple platforms.

Dries quickly for a smooth, fresh feel all day long. Perfect for sports or casual wear.
- Featuring DRY-EX technology.
- Added odor control features.
- French sleeve design with an iconic Futura print..
- A versatile item for sports or everyday wear.

Futura Laboratories LLC.
items.name: WOMEN FUTURA LABORATORIES DRY-EX Crew Neck Short Sleeve T-Shirt
items.shortDescription: Dries quickly for a smooth, fresh feel all day long. Perfect for sports or casual wear.

items.longDescription:
Cassie Byrnes

A print designer based in Australia. Combining an old and new school approach to textile design, Cassie's creative work reflects her love of bold colour and nature, with a focus on Australiana and an abstract exploration of native flora & fauna. Cassie's artworks begin with hand generated media such as collage, paint and loose ink mark making before blending it with digital practices that amplify the artworks' original integrity and handwriting.

©Cassie Byrnes

items.longDescription:
UTGP2020 + MoMA

The UT GRAND PRIX (UTGP) is a design competition that started in 2005 that uses the T-shirt as a creative medium and invites everyone to freely express creativity. For the 15th UTGP, UNIQLO worked with MoMA (The Museum of Modern Art) in New York City and invited prominent artists, with work in MoMA’s collection, to be contest judges: Lawrence Weiner, Paula Scher and Sarah Morris. Participants designed T-shirts based on the theme “DRAW YOUR WORLD.”
items.name: WOMEN UTGP UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: UTGP is a design competition that uses the T-shirt as a creative medium and invites everyone to freely express creativity.

items.longDescription:
Disney Princesses and Villains

From Princesses to Villains, the women of Disney are all unique. Each character has her own charming characteristics and is the star of her own story! This collection is inspired by the charm of such characters.

©Disney

items.longDescription:
UTGP2020 + MoMA

The UT GRAND PRIX (UTGP) is a design competition that started in 2005 that uses the T-shirt as a creative medium and invites everyone to freely express creativity. For the 15th UTGP, UNIQLO worked with MoMA (The Museum of Modern Art) in New York City and invited prominent artists, with work in MoMA’s collection, to be contest judges: Lawrence Weiner, Paula Scher and Sarah Morris. Participants designed T-shirts based on the theme “DRAW YOUR WORLD.”

Sarah Morris

Sarah Morris is known for her complex abstractions both in film and painting and is one of the most intriguing artists of her generation. Morris’s paintings explore the codes and power structures of architecture and cultural symbols. Color and form are central to the work and remain resolutely social. Strategies of communication remain at the heart of Morris’s work. She is interested in ‘the most simplified, coded way to have a conversation with the viewer.’

© Sarah Morris
Project: 2020 by The Museum of Modern Art

items.longDescription:
Disney Mickey Mouse & Minnie Mouse art by Yuni Yoshida

Art director Yuni Yoshida brings her unique sensibility to the world-famous Disney icons, Mickey Mouse and Minnie Mouse. This is a special collection where you can enjoy the fusion of cute and adorable Disney characters and innovative ideas.

Yuni Yoshida

Joined Onuki Design after graduating from Joshibi University of Art and Design. Became independent in 2007 after working with Uchu Country. Yoshida is active in a wide variety of fields, including advertising, CD jackets, images and videos, binding, and more. Main works include campaign visual for Laforet Harajuku, CD artwork for Chara, Kaela Kimura, and Gen Hoshino, as well as art direction for "THE BEE" and "In the Forest, Under Cherries in Full Bloom" theater productions by Hideki Noda and the Naomi Watanabe Exhibition. Received the 2016 Tokyo ADC Award.

©Disney
items.name: WOMEN Disney Art By Yuni UT(Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: Unique silhouettes of Mickey Mouse and Minnie Mouse! An artistic collection that shines with the sensitivity of Yuni Yoshida.

items.longDescription:
Alice in Wonderland

Alice is an extremely brave young girl with lots of imagination and is often seen daydreaming. She’s not afraid to venture far out into new places or the unknown and she will become determined to investigate anything curious that makes her wonder. Follow along with her adventures in Wonderland.

AUTO MOAI

An artist who works with the theme of “anonymity,” based in Japan. AUTO MOAI uses faceless figures to express the invisible, tacit connections between people on the street.

©Disney
items.name: WOMEN Alice in Wonderland UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: This collection features fresh illustrations by up-and-coming artists of Alice from the Disney film “Alice and Wonderland” which is celebrating its 70th anniversary.

items.longDescription:
Cats are Purrfect!

A T-shirt collection featuring graphics showing abundant love for cats drawn by artists who love cats. “Purrfect” is a coined word that combines Purr, meaning the purring sound of cats in English, and Perfect. “Cats are Purrfect” is a cat joke, meaning “Cats are the best!”

Tiffany Cooper

Tiffany Cooper is an author and illustrator and a true Parisian. She first got known by her blog The Best of Possible Worlds, which she created in 2012 to have fun at the same time as she was looking for a job. A publisher noticed her blog and published her first book. Since then, she has published four other books and has collaborated with concept store Colette, Karl Lagerfeld, Evian, Elle Girl, Kiehl's, VANS and many other brands.
items.name: WOMEN Cats Are Purrfect UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: A UT collection full of love for cats drawn by an unmatched cat-loving artist!

items.longDescription:
Cats are Purrfect!

A T-shirt collection featuring graphics showing abundant love for cats drawn by artists who love cats. “Purrfect” is a coined word that combines Purr, meaning the purring sound of cats in English, and Perfect. “Cats are Purrfect” is a cat joke, meaning “Cats are the best!”

Marie Ahfeldt

With a Master of Fine Arts degree in graphic design and illustration, Marie graduated from Konstfack, the University of Art, Crafts and Design, Stockholm in 1990. Marie has since been working as a freelance illustrator. Clients include publishing houses, magazines, agencies, and companies. As an experienced illustrator, Marie is good at conveying feelings and capturing emotions in both forms and images. She is passionate in her work, and she likes to add a twist to things.
items.name: WOMEN Cats Are Purrfect UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: A UT collection full of love for cats drawn by an unmatched cat-loving artist!

items.longDescription:
Finlayson

Finlayson, founded in 1820, is by far one of the most beloved textile brands in Finland and many Finns have a strong bond with their design. Finlayson has contributed to the birth of Scandinavian design and this collection consists of gems from their archives.

Finlayson ® © Finlayson Oy
items.name: WOMEN Finlayson UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: A colorful collection created in partnership with Finland's oldest Nordic textile brand, Finlayson.

items.longDescription:
Finlayson

Finlayson, founded in 1820, is by far one of the most beloved textile brands in Finland and many Finns have a strong bond with their design. Finlayson has contributed to the birth of Scandinavian design and this collection consists of gems from their archives.

Finlayson ® © Finlayson Oy
items.name: WOMEN Finlayson UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: A colorful collection created in partnership with Finland's oldest Nordic textile brand, Finlayson.

items.longDescription:
DISNEY LOVE MINNIE MOUSE COLLECTION by AMBUSH

UNIQLO proudly presents the exclusive collection featuring Minnie Mouse in collaboration with AMBUSH designer YOON. Enjoy the synergy between the fashion icon Minnie Mouse and the products inspired by an ath-leisure lifestyle.

YOON

YOON founded AMBUSH along with VERBAL in 2008 as an experimental line of jewelry – innovative pop art inspired designs capturing a distinct Tokyo aesthetic. The brand made its Paris debut in 2015 with YOON and VERBAL being listed as two of Business of Fashion’ s Top 500 people influencing the global fashion industry for 4 consecutive years since 2015. In 2018, Kim Jones named YOON as Jewelry Director for Dior Men, with the first creations for the house debuting with the S/S 2019 collection in Paris.

©Disney
items.name: WOMEN Minnie Ambush UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: A Minnie Mouse collection specially created by AMBUSH creative director, YOON, and UNIQLO

items.longDescription:
FUTURALABORATORIES

FUTURALABORATORIES is a design company and lifestyle brand created by the artist FUTURA2000 in 1997, as a spinoff group to the parent company at that time; PROJECTDRAGON. FUTURALABORATORIES has always worked closely with UMBRELLA FILMS for visual amplification and TARANTULA DESIGNS as a graphic think tank. The brand has created many collections over multiple decades and found numerous partners in various collaborative efforts. FUTURALABORATORIES was rebooted in 2019 with excitement and engagement across multiple platforms.

Stay-fresh leggings with built-in UV protection. Adds a style accent in layered looks.
- The distinctive print by Futura is perfect for casual or sporty outfits.

Futura Laboratories LLC.

- Used special material that tightens around your stomach with just the right amount for the front pockets.
- Ankle-length, high rise, and skinny straight silhouette make your legs look sleek.
- The stitch colors are relaxed tones, so they can be paired with both casual and dressier styles.
- Legs that look even more slim, with laser processing that was achieved through repeated trial and error.

items.longDescription:
Musée du Louvre: Blossoms of Diversity

Numerous works of art displayed in the Louvre museum feature women as their central theme. From these works of art created by the masters of aesthetics, you can admire their versatile appearances in multi-layered ways. In the past, enjoying art used to be accessible for only a select few, but now it can be part of our daily lives. This is a special collection which celebrates this blissfulness.

La Belle Jardinière – Madonna and Child with Saint John the Baptist / Raffaello SANTI, known as Raphael
© RMN-Grand Palais (Musée du Louvre) / Franck Raux
Flowers, Shells, Butterflies, and Grasshopper / Balthasar van der AST
© RMN-Grand Palais (Musée du Louvre) / Tony Querrec
Louvre Pyramid © I.M. Pei
items.name: WOMEN Louvre Museum UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: Focusing in on the “diversity of women” found among the Louvre Museum’s art collections. A beautiful UT collection.

- Two layers of leather adds thickness. Special manufacturing process softens the leather.
- Each belt is hand-woven to highlight the thickness of high-quality leather.
- Mesh belt can be adjusted for a perfect fit.
- Simple design is great for a casual look.
- Also can be worn over a shirt or a dress.
items.name: WOMEN Mesh Skinny Belt
items.shortDescription: Elegant hand-woven mesh belt. Skinny design is perfect for defining the waistline.

items.longDescription:
- Moderately-wrinkled Italian leather creates a vintage look.
- The dehairing process creates a vintage look. A unique patina on the leather will develop over time.
- The new design this season features an elegant buckle.
- Easy to pair with casual bottoms.
items.name: WOMEN Vintage Belt
items.shortDescription: Made with distressed Italian leather. Exquisite buckle adds elegance.

items.longDescription:
- Beautiful fine-grain Italian leather has a clean and smooth finish.
- The unique quality of leather and the patina will develop over time.
- Matte buckle is perfect for a neat casual look.
items.name: WOMEN Clean Belt
items.shortDescription: High-quality belt made with Italian leather. Simple design highlights the beauty of the material.

items.longDescription:
- Added water-repellent coating that repels light rain.
- A high-tech parka that is easy to carry around, and that you can throw on anywhere at any time.
items.name: WOMEN Pocketable UV Cut Parka
items.shortDescription: Compact and easy to carry around. Keep it in your bag, and it will come in handy for strong UV rays or sudden rain.

items.longDescription:
- Durable water-repellent coating.
- Lightweight nylon fabric.
- Convenient compact design packs down easily.
items.name: WOMEN UNIQLO + Light Pocketable Parka
items.shortDescription: A parka made with lightweight, durable water-repellent fabric. Easily packs into an interior pocket for easy carrying.

items.longDescription:
- Stretch yarn for comfort.
- Body map stitching ensures excellent ventilation.
- Contoured sleeves based on biomechanical design.
- Sustainable design made with weft knitting machines to reduce waste.
items.name: WOMEN UNIQLO + Knitted Jacket
items.shortDescription: A comfortable knit jacket that provides breathability and ease of movement.

items.longDescription:
- With Cool Touch, absorbent, quick-drying, and moisture-wicking functions.
- Versatile design in basic colors.
items.name: AIRism Duvet Cover (Single)
items.shortDescription: For a cool, comfortable night’s sleep.
items.washingInformation:
Machine wash cold, gentle cycle
Do not tumble dry

items.longDescription:
- Redesigned to be static-free thanks to a special lining.
- Pocketable design can be stored in the carrying pouch.
- New longer and thinner silhouette.
- The high collar makes it ideal outerwear, and the shape when you open the zipper is flattering.
- The rounded top of the collar creates a contoured form.
- Seam is aligned with stitches behind the waist to maintain a streamlined look.
- Soft and stretchy tape added to the inside so the cuffs stay rolled up.
- Seam is aligned with stitches behind the waist to maintain a streamlined look.
- The storage pouch comes with a loop that can be hung on the inner left side so you won’t lose it.
items.name: WOMEN Ultra Light Down Jacket
items.shortDescription: The ultra-static fleece provides even more comfort. Thin, light, and warm so it can be used as an innerwear or outerwear.

items.longDescription:

- Versatile design in basic colors.
